title: How is St. Xavier's college (Mumbai) for B.COM? - Quora

response.answer_text: St. Xavier’s College, Mumbai has been given by Grade A by NACC (National Assessment and Accreditation Council) which makes it one of the best colleges if not at the top for B.com. There are other colleges which you can consider are:- Narsee Monjee College of Commerce and EconomicsR. A. Poddar College of Commerce and EconomicsH.R. College of Commerce and EconomicsK.J. Somaiya College of Arts and CommerceK.P.B. Hinduja College of Commerce.As Mumbai has many good colleges for commerce you really have a good option to look upto.

Hi. So, the B.Com section is an evening one in our college. It’s mostly for those who are working or have some other problem. I won’t really recommend you to look forward to joining Xavier’s for B.com. Also, a big minus point is, that you will never be able to be a part of any fest or any other event that happens in the campus. If you are still keen, or want to know more, feel free to visit the office from 10:30–12:45.
